widget.name: Advanced Sorting
widget.description: Reusable widget to encapsulate the logic needed to manually do sorting

property.caption: Header Content
property.description: The content shown in the header

property.caption: Attribute Name
property.description: The name of the attribute to be sorted, should match the database's attribute name exactly

property.caption: Ascending Icon
property.description: Icon shown next to the header

property.caption: Descending Icon
property.description: Icon shown next to the header

property.caption: Refresh Action
property.description: Must be a Microflow or Nanoflow that has a Refresh in Client on the parent dataview's object

property.caption: Sort Attribute
property.description: Attribute to set the string, should be on the parent data view's object

property.caption: Sort Ascending
property.description: Attribute to determin the direction of the sorting, should be a boolean on the parent data view's object. True = ascending, False = descending
